_header: After the Black Prime what year so it be
_description: Instructions for finding the date of Easter after the ‘Black Prime’ — one couplet

Ushaw10.Transcription:
Aftre the blak pryme what yere so it bethe next sonday say laus
                        tibi domine
Ushaw10.Note:
Couplet added at bottom of first (Jan.) page of kalendar of
                    saints’ days.
